samples.context: Smooth muscle is found in those organs where involuntary movement is possible, e.g. alimentary canal. The cells of smooth muscles are spindle-shaped and each has one nucleus.
samples.question: What shape are smooth muscle cells?

samples.context: The cells of smooth muscles are spindle-shaped and each has one nucleus. Smooth muscle is found in those organs where involuntary movement is possible, e.g. alimentary canal.
samples.question: Where is smooth muscle commonly found?
